A sleepy reading from a series of fascinating essays detailing the use of woods and glass in the construction of fine furniture and art.

Excerpts from 1983's "Arts and Crafts Essays" by the Arts and Crafts Exhibition Society. Read for Librivox by Peter Yearsley, end edited for sleep by Slumber.
